Is there a class (extension or otherwise) that not only repeats 
defined number of times (like RepeatedTest) but also can test for 
simultaneous hits (may be by starting multiple threads of the 
repeated tests). This will help to simulate Continuous Hours of 
Stress/Operation for a Server Component.

Say there is a component that is accessed "24 X 7" by "N" number of 
simultaneous users/clients on the Internet/Intranet. RepeatedTest 
allows one to simulate the "24 X 7" portion. How about if one needs 
to also simulate the number "N" of simultaneous users/clients?
